about_the_game:
This optional DLC pack consists of:

  • An in-game thank you card from me, the developer.
  • A special role in the Festival Tycoon Discord server.
  • A supporter Pack flair via Discord Rich Presence (others can see you’re a supporter via the ‘Playing Now’ screen in Discord).
  • A special in-game item only available via the Supporter Pack DLC.

This pack is not required to play Festival Tycoon. It’s an optional DLC for those who want to help me, as a solo indie developer, with the development of the game. The perks provided won’t give anyone an unfair advantage, they’re just a way for me to thank people for their support.

This optional DLC pack consists of:

  • A special role in the Festival Tycoon Discord server.
  • A supporter Pack flair via Discord Rich Presence (others can see you’re a supporter via the ‘Playing Now’ screen in Discord).
  • A special in-game item only available via the Supporter Pack DLC.

This pack is not required to play Festival Tycoon. It’s an optional DLC for those who want to help me, as a solo indie developer, with the development of the game. The perks provided won’t give anyone an unfair advantage, they’re just a way for me to thank people for their support.
name: Festival Tycoon - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1600x900 monitor resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 monitor resolution

short_description: Optional Supporter pack DLC for super cool Festival Tycoon fans. The game where you create and manage your own music festival empire.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
